com.joffrey_bion.binary_io

Class UnicodeReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • com.joffrey_bion.binary_io.UnicodeReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable

    public class UnicodeReader
extends Reader
    A reader that read and skips the BOM (Byte Order Mark), using it to determine the encoding of the file.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnicodeReader(String filename)
      Creates a UnicodeReader for the specified file.
      UnicodeReader(String filename, String defaultEncoding)
      Creates a UnicodeReader for the specified file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnicodeReader

        public UnicodeReader(String filename)
              throws IOException
        Creates a UnicodeReader for the specified file. Uses system default encoding if BOM is not found.
        Parameters:
        filename - Input file.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • UnicodeReader

        public UnicodeReader(String filename,
             String defaultEncoding)
              throws IOException
        Creates a UnicodeReader for the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filename - Input file.
        defaultEncoding - Default encoding to be used if BOM is not found, or null to use system default encoding.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • getEncoding

        public String getEncoding()
        Returns the encoding used to read the file. It was determined by the BOM if any, otherwise it is the given default encoding or system default, as specified by UnicodeReader(String) or UnicodeReader(String, String).
        Returns:
        The encoding used to read the file.
